info.description: This endpoint is deprecated and will not receive any future updates. Please use the Financial Hierarchy v1 or v2 endpoint
info.title: Profit Centers (Deprecated)

tags.name: Profit Centers
tags.description: This API will return a list of Aramark Profit Centers

get.summary: Return a collection of Profit Centers

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search string to find Locations. Searches against Site Name, Profit Center Name, District Name, Region Name, LOB Name or BSU Name

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of Site to return Profit Centers.

parameters.name: profit_center
parameters.description: Unique ID of Profit Center to return.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of data set to return

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of rows in each page to return.

parameters.name: bypass-cache
parameters.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify permissions.

parameters.name: smoke
parameters.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP header variable will route the API call to the Integration testing environment.  Only applicable in QA.

count.description: Number of records returned in request

size.description: Number of records returned with the result set

profit_center.description: Unique code for a Profit Center, sourced by BIC or MDG

profit_center_enabled.description: Indicator to filter whether Profit Center is active

site_id.description: Site ID coming from source system CSP Will be deprecated once MDG application is fully implemented

site_no.description: Site No coming from source system CSP

site.description: Global Unique identifier coming from MDG system

district.description: Global Unique identifier of District coming from MDG or BIC systems

region.description: Global Unique identifier of Region coming from MDG or BIC systems

lob.description: Global Unique identifier of Line of Business coming from MDG or BIC systems

lob_name.description: Business name of Line of Business

business_unit.description: Global Unique identifier of Business Unit coming from MDG or BIC systems

create_date.description: Calendar date when Site was created

last_update_date.description: Calendar date when Site was last updated
